title: RoHan Hero Server Files
description:
***This server file is a normal server no have any cheats protection.


**This Server file fix minimapjump, call, hide, grade

Extract Pass = "##senzoku"


--HOW TO SETUP.


1.Extract DB_ROHAN HERO


2.Restore all DB in MSSQL 2008 r2


3.Open RohanUser > Tables > TServer
Change all 192.168.56.101 to your IP


4.Extract Server_ROHAN to C:
Code:
Ex. C:ROHANROHAN
5.Extract RohanAuth_xampp to C:


6.edit 
Code:
C:xampphtdocsRohanAuthincludedbconn.php
ServerName = your computer name
uid = sa    
pwd = your mssql pass


7.edit 192.168.56.101 to your IP in
Code:
C:xampphtdocsRohanAuthServerList5.php

8.Run C:xamppxampp-control.exe


9.Extract Registry_ROHAN 64 bit


10.edit the Registry by "right Click > Edit"
Code:
-change all ip 192.168.56.101 to your ip
-change all Server name "WIN-QV8AHRK1H63" to your computer name 
-change all PWD "ab123456##" to your MSSQL Pass
-save

11.double Click Registry_ROHAN 64 bit > Yes > OK


12.Run Server
Code:
-C:ROHANROHANFairyAgentServerAgentServer.exe
-C:ROHANROHANFairyDBServerDBServerT.exe
-C:ROHANROHANFairyLogserverLogServer.exe
-C:ROHANROHANFairyLogserverLogServer.exe
-C:ROHANROHANFairyMapIDMapID.exe
-C:ROHANROHANFairyAIServerAIServer.exe
***For AIServer Click CONNECT it will start

13.Extract Rohan-Game


14.Edit IP in rungame.bat


15.run rungame.bat and enjoy the game


--ID/Pass

Code:
Game Master ID
ID = big
pass = 1234

Normal ID
ID = big2
pass = 1234

--Make own account

Code:
1.insert it in the mssql
2.RohanUser > Tables > TUser
***for login_pw use MD5 for your password 



--GM account

Code:
1.set you id grade to 250
2.goto your mssql
3.Modify "RohanUser>Programmability>System Stored Procedures>ROHAN4_Login"
4.Modify "RohanGame>Programmability>System Stored Procedures>ROHAN6_GetCharacter"

--Else's

Code:
this i set for auto job change lv 50 (relogin for change job)
"RohanGame>Programmability>System Stored Procedures>ROHAN_EndGame"

this i have set for make new Character (give item to beginner)
"RohanGame>Programmability>System Stored Procedures>ROHAN_CreateCharacter"
